right.name: age_at_diagnosis
right.description: Age at diagnosis of condition (in days)

description.data: Age at diagnosis of condition (in days)

left.name: is_self_reported
left.description: Indicates whether the information is reported by donor or extracted from (administrative) health records

right.name: is_self_reported
right.description: Indicates whether the information is reported by donor or extracted from (administrative) health records

meta.notes: Basis of diagnosis is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer
Basis of diagnosis is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer

left.name: clinical_stage_group
left.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

meta.notes: This field is dependent on the selected tumour_staging_system

right.name: clinical_stage_group
right.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

meta.notes: This field is dependent on the selected tumour_staging_system

left.name: m_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

right.name: m_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected clinical_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

notes.data: This field is required only if the selected clinical_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

left.name: smoking_pack_years
left.description: Number of packs of cigarette multiplied by the number of cigarettes smoked

meta.notes: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes (20 cigarettes per pack) smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

right.name: smoking_pack_years
right.description: Number of packs of cigarette multiplied by the number of cigarettes smoked

meta.notes: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

notes.data: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year
